frameset.edef: to be or become mute, t be dumb

example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-ADV (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_ACC يَوْماً)) (S-PRD (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ اِذا) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS نَطَق) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS خرسِت) (NP-SBJ (NOUN باقِي) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL الأَصْوات))) (NP-ADV (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC إِجْلالاً) (CONJ وَ) (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC تَعْظِيماً)) (PP (PREP لَ) (NP (NOUN دَوْر) (NP (NOUN_PROP مِصْر))))))))))) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-2))))))
